Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class TaskTimeoutRequestFilter.Please

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.TaskTimeoutRequestFilter.Please
  • Enclosing interface:
    TaskTimeoutRequestFilter
    public static class TaskTimeoutRequestFilter.Please
extends java.lang.Object
    Use static constructor methods to create instances to return from TaskTimeoutRequestFilter.onEvent(TaskTimeoutRequestEvent).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static TaskTimeoutRequestFilter.Please doNotUseTimeout()
      Tells SweetBlue to not timeout the task at all.
      static TaskTimeoutRequestFilter.Please setTimeoutFor​(Interval interval)
      Tells SweetBlue to wait for the given interval before timing out the task.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • setTimeoutFor

        public static TaskTimeoutRequestFilter.Please setTimeoutFor​(Interval interval)
        Tells SweetBlue to wait for the given interval before timing out the task.

      • doNotUseTimeout

        public static TaskTimeoutRequestFilter.Please doNotUseTimeout()
        Tells SweetBlue to not timeout the task at all.

        WARNING: This can be dangerous to use because if a task never finishes it will block all other operations indefinitely.
